mapper.update: UPDATE FORUM_THEME SET BROWSE = BROWSE + 1 WHERE ID = #{themeId}
mapper.select: SELECT A.* FROM FORUM_THEME A INNER JOIN FORUM_CONTENT B ON A.ID = B.THEME_REF_ID WHERE B.ORDER_NUMBER = (SELECT MAX(C.ORDER_NUMBER) FROM FORUM_CONTENT C WHERE B.THEME_REF_ID = C.THEME_REF_ID) AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM TOPIC_INCLUDE C WHERE C.THEME_REF_ID = A.ID AND C.TOPIC_ID = #{topicId}) ORDER BY B.CREATE_TIME DESC LIMIT #{currentPageNumber}, #{num}
SELECT CAST(COUNT(*) AS CHAR) FROM FORUM_THEME
SELECT * FROM FORUM_THEME WHERE THEME_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{forumThemeName}), '%') ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC LIMIT 0,10;
